articles.author: Pieter Haeck, Jacob Parry
articles.title: Apple blocks translation AirPods in EU over regulatory concerns - politico.eu
articles.description: Europeans won’t be able to enjoy a shiny new feature Apple presented at this week’s unveiling of a set of new iPhones and AirPods. Apple introduced new AirPods on Tuesday, featuring real-time trans…
articles.content:
Live translation with AirPods is not available if you are in the EU and your Apple account country or region is also in the EU, an Apple support page reads.
Apple is blocking the functionality due t… [+672 chars]
